Promote your page using social widgets

The Like Box and Like Button are social widgets that allow you to attract and gain Likes from your own website, blog or any other web page. These widgets enable your users to:
   - See how many users already like this page, and which of their friends like it too
   - Like the page with one click, without needing to visit the page
